heading: Full-Stack Software Engineer
description: Highly driven Full Stack Software Engineer with 3 years of experience building robust, scalable solutions. I specialize in the modern JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystem, delivering end-to-end functionality across the stack. My expertise includes React, Next.js, and Node.js, with experience in both Relational and NoSQL databases. I also possess foundational knowledge of AWS and CI/CD (Jenkins), having collaborated closely with DevOps teams. A continuous learner focused on applying core engineering principles and leveraging emerging technologies (including AI-driven workflows) to maximize development speed and quality.
